name: Enoch: Football Collection
description: The Enoch Football Collection is an exciting series of 3D collectible accessories designed to enhance your Enoch Avatars in the enoch.app. Customize your virtual identity with exclusive football merchandise like jersey sets, trophies, footballs, wristbands, and more. What's more, these custom avatars will have the potential to be ported to other metaverses, opening up a world of possibilities for showcasing your unique style and passion for football across different virtual environments.
